module.name: Core
module.changelog: *12.0.1alpha14* fixes for presence state *12.0.1alpha13* Add option for displaying presence state in connectedline name *12.0.1alpha12* Fix for incorrectly parsed http.conf migration settings *12.0.1alpha11* Monitor Presence on extension hints *12.0.1alpha10* FREEPBX-7077 Allow old style dial patterns for users with 1000s of Dial Patterns *12.0.1alpha9* FREEPBX-7091 Added back ability to edit and add IAX2 *12.0.1alpha8* Added Asterisk HTTP Definitions *12.0.1alpha7* Log out logged in user is they are changing the password *12.0.1alpha6* Use PJSIP_DIAL_CONTACTS for PJSIP channels. *12.0.1alpha5* Allow changing of SIP Driver on extensions *12.0.1alpha4* Asterisk module management and fixes *12.0.1alpha3* More work on PJSip in extensions *12.0.1alpha2* Bump Version Number and make release 12 branch *2.12.0alpha1* PJSIP Support *2.11.0.11* Added HTTP.conf to core *2.11.0.10* #6915, #6318, #6902 *2.11.0.9* #6993 Add new toll-free route to wizard *2.11.0.8* Dont generate SIP Secret if device was previously saved with no SIP Secret *2.11.0.7* #6786, #6462, #6922, #6345 *2.11.0.6* #6522, #6758, #6750, #6753 *2.11.0.5* #6760 *2.11.0.4* #6732, #6766 *2.11.0.3* #6147, #6681, #6731 *2.11.0.2* #6654, #6639, #6366 *2.11.0.1* #6535, #6604, #6576 *2.11.0.0* 2.11.0 final *2.11.0.0rc1.5* change dependency *2.11.0.0rc1.4* #6366, #6541 *2.11.0.0rc1.3* Fixes to gui_drawselects re #6541 *2.11.0.0rc1.2* Fixes #6446, queue recording *2.11.0.0rc1.1* at generation set rtp values if class is empty *2.11.0.0rc1.0* rtp.conf cleanup, misc *2.11.0.0beta2.7* Fixes #6459, #6237 call fails on internal pickup in ring group when call confirm is enabled *2.11.0.0beta2.6* r15400 *2.11.0.0beta2.5* r15308 *2.11.0.0beta2.4* Move control of rtp.conf and rtp_additional.conf into core re #6397 *2.11.0.0beta2.3* #5977, #6262, #6292, #6337 *2.11.0.0beta2.2* #5828, #6263 *2.11.0.0beta2.1* #6261 *2.11.0.0beta2.0* more on #5782, #6141, beta2
